Question: This person's army of 11,000 went into winter quarters at Valley Forge north of Philadelphia in December 1777.
Hints: In 1755, this person was the senior American aide to British General Edward Braddock on the ill-fated Braddock expedition.
In command of a thousand soldiers, this person was a disciplinarian who emphasized training.
This person personally oversaw this effort throughout his term in office.
